profile.name: Your Name
profile.shortIntro: Passionate about building beautiful, performant web experiences that make a difference.
profile.detailedIntro: I'm a full-stack developer with a passion for creating elegant solutions to complex problems. With expertise in modern web technologies and a keen eye for design, I bridge the gap between functionality and aesthetics. My approach combines technical excellence with user-centered thinking to deliver products that not only work flawlessly but also delight users.

Reduced application load time by 60% through optimization
Mentored 5 junior developers and established code review practices

Collaborated with design team to improve UX/UI standards
